DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to rigorously assess a program designed to empower patient living with HIV, to improve their health care and health, and to reduce disparities.
DOC.brief_title: Get Ready And Empowered About Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Our project has four major aims: 1. Assess improvement in patient empowerment 2. Assess improvement in patients' receipt of evidence-based care 3. Assess improvement in patients' health 4. Assess reduction in disparities in empowerment
DOC.criteria: age18 years or older, confirmed HIV diagnosis receipt of care within a participating site. inability to provide informed consent limited English proficiency (Trainings and Personal Health Record are currently only available in English)
